---
title: "Hands-on Exercise 1"
author: "Quynh Trang Do"
date: "19 April, 2024"
date-modified: "last-modified"
format:
  html:
    theme: cosmo
---

# Getting started

## Installing and launching R packages

The code chunk below uses p_load() of pacman package to check if tidyverse packages are installed in the computer. If they are, then they will be launched into R.


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
pacman::p_load(tidyverse)
```
:::


## Importing the data


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
exam_data <- read_csv("data/Exam_data.csv")
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}

```
Rows: 322 Columns: 7
── Column specification ────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
Delimiter: ","
chr (4): ID, CLASS, GENDER, RACE
dbl (3): ENGLISH, MATHS, SCIENCE

ℹ Use `spec()` to retrieve the full column specification for this data.
ℹ Specify the column types or set `show_col_types = FALSE` to quiet this message.
```


:::
:::


# Geometric objects

## Plotting a simple bar chart


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
ggplot(data = exam_data,
       aes(x=RACE)) +
  geom_bar()
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](Hands-on_Ex01_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-3-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::


## Plotting a dot plot


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
ggplot(data=exam_data, 
       aes(x = MATHS)) +
  geom_dotplot(dotsize = 0.5)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}

```
Bin width defaults to 1/30 of the range of the data. Pick better value with
`binwidth`.
```


:::

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](Hands-on_Ex01_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-4-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::


*Turn off the y-axis and add binwidth argument*


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
ggplot(data=exam_data, 
       aes(x = MATHS)) +
  geom_dotplot(binwidth=2.5,         
               dotsize = 0.5) +      
  scale_y_continuous(NULL,           
                     breaks = NULL)  
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](Hands-on_Ex01_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-5-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::


## Plotting a histogram


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
ggplot(data=exam_data, 
       aes(x = MATHS)) +
  geom_histogram()       
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}

```
`stat_bin()` using `bins = 30`. Pick better value with `binwidth`.
```


:::

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](Hands-on_Ex01_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-6-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::


*Change number of bins, fill, and outline color*


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
ggplot(data=exam_data, 
       aes(x= MATHS)) +
  geom_histogram(bins=20,            
                 color="black",      
                 fill="light blue")  
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](Hands-on_Ex01_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-7-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::


*Change aes() for sub-group*


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
ggplot(data=exam_data, 
       aes(x= MATHS, 
           fill = GENDER)) +
  geom_histogram(bins=20, 
                 color="grey30")
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](Hands-on_Ex01_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-8-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::


## Plotting kernel density estimate


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
ggplot(data=exam_data, 
       aes(x = MATHS)) +
  geom_density()           
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](Hands-on_Ex01_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-9-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::



::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
ggplot(data=exam_data, 
       aes(x = MATHS, 
           colour = GENDER)) +
  geom_density()
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](Hands-on_Ex01_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-10-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::


## Plotting a boxplot


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
ggplot(data=exam_data, 
       aes(y = MATHS,       
           x= GENDER)) +    
  geom_boxplot()            
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](Hands-on_Ex01_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-11-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::


## Plotting a notched plot


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
ggplot(data=exam_data, 
       aes(y = MATHS, 
           x= GENDER)) +
  geom_boxplot(notch=TRUE)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](Hands-on_Ex01_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-12-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::


## Plotting a violin plot


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
ggplot(data=exam_data, 
       aes(y = MATHS, 
           x= GENDER)) +
  geom_violin()
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](Hands-on_Ex01_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-13-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::


## Plotting a scatterplot


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
ggplot(data=exam_data, 
       aes(x= MATHS, 
           y=ENGLISH)) +
  geom_point()            
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](Hands-on_Ex01_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-14-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::


## Combined plot


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
ggplot(data=exam_data, 
       aes(y = MATHS, 
           x= GENDER)) +
  geom_boxplot() +                    
  geom_point(position="jitter", 
             size = 0.5)        
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](Hands-on_Ex01_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-15-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::


# Statistics function

## Add mean value

*stat_summary( ) method*


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
ggplot(data=exam_data, 
       aes(y = MATHS, x= GENDER)) +
  geom_boxplot() +
  stat_summary(geom = "point",       
               fun = "mean",         
               colour ="red",        
               size=4)               
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](Hands-on_Ex01_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-16-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::


*geom( ) method*


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
ggplot(data=exam_data, 
       aes(y = MATHS, x= GENDER)) +
  geom_boxplot() +
  geom_point(stat="summary",        
             fun="mean",           
             colour="red",          
             size=4)          
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](Hands-on_Ex01_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-17-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::


## Add best fit curve


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
ggplot(data=exam_data, 
       aes(x= MATHS, y=ENGLISH)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_smooth(size=0.5)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}

```
Warning: Using `size` aesthetic for lines was deprecated in ggplot2 3.4.0.
ℹ Please use `linewidth` instead.
```


:::

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}

```
`geom_smooth()` using method = 'loess' and formula = 'y ~ x'
```


:::

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](Hands-on_Ex01_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-18-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::



::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
ggplot(data=exam_data, 
       aes(x= MATHS, 
           y=ENGLISH)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_smooth(method=lm, 
              linewidth=0.5)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}

```
`geom_smooth()` using formula = 'y ~ x'
```


:::

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](Hands-on_Ex01_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-19-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::


# Facets

## facet_wrap method


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
ggplot(data=exam_data, 
       aes(x= MATHS)) +
  geom_histogram(bins=20) +
    facet_wrap(~ CLASS)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](Hands-on_Ex01_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-20-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::


## facet_grid method


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
ggplot(data=exam_data, 
       aes(x= MATHS)) +
  geom_histogram(bins=20) +
    facet_grid(~ CLASS)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](Hands-on_Ex01_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-21-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::


# Coordinates

## Flip horizontal bar chart into vertical bar chart


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
ggplot(data=exam_data, 
       aes(x=RACE)) +
  geom_bar() +
  coord_flip()
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](Hands-on_Ex01_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-22-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::


## Change y- and x-axis range


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
ggplot(data=exam_data, 
       aes(x= MATHS, y=ENGLISH)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_smooth(method=lm, 
              size=0.5) +  
  coord_cartesian(xlim=c(0,100),
                  ylim=c(0,100))
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}

```
`geom_smooth()` using formula = 'y ~ x'
```


:::

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](Hands-on_Ex01_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-23-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::


# Themes


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
ggplot(data=exam_data, 
       aes(x=RACE)) +
  geom_bar() +
  coord_flip() +
  theme_classic()
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](Hands-on_Ex01_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-24-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::



::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
ggplot(data=exam_data, 
       aes(x=RACE)) +
  geom_bar() +
  coord_flip() +
  theme_minimal()
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](Hands-on_Ex01_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-25-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::
